page.title: 08LEISURE CENTRE ROTHERHAM
page.content: The Leisure Centre is a large building next to the Herringthorpe playing fields.Inside there is a large number of activities to choose from, such as swimming,keep fit, judo, badminton, tennis, gymnastics, squash, playgroups, rollerskating,and archery. To get inside you have to go up a slope into the entrance where you pay the price for what ever you want to do.The prices are quite expensive. It is very busy on Saturdays and even busier on a Sunday but the rest of the week it is quite empty so it is better to go in the week than at the weekends.Most of the facilities are very good but some of them could be made alot better.The ones that could be improved are the pool,the squash couts, and the gymnastics facilities.
